name: Meme Drinking Game
description:
From the twisted depths of the internet comes a drinking game so foul that no decent human being should ever be forced to play it. But they will, because they are trash and belong in a dumpster.

With a host of classic cards combined with a ton of brand new cards the Meme drinking game will in the best case provide you with many evenings of fun, and in the worst case will probably put you into a coma.
